events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it's still not arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated in days.
System categorized the issue as Delivery Delay due to keywords found in customer's message.
Support agent assigned to handle the delayed shipment complaint for the customer.
Hello! Sorry to hear your package hasn't arrived yet. I'm here to help you track this down.
Could you please provide the order number and any tracking details you have so I can look into this for you?
The order number is 123456789. The tracking number hasn't updated since it was shipped four days ago.
I have contacted the shipping company and they confirmed a delay due to weather. Your package should arrive within 3 days.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate you checking, though I had hoped it would be here sooner.
We'll continue to monitor your shipment and inform you immediately if there are further delays.
Just checking in to see if your package has arrived safely now. Please let us know if any more issues arise.
Yes, the package finally arrived today. Everything looks good, thank you for your help!
We are glad your issue is resolved. Closing this case now, and thank you for contacting support.
